Html:
Hi guys I need help in using a directshow capture decvice as source, when i try to open it as "Open streaming" and i put "dshow://"
I just see a blank screen.
I tried "screen://" and ir works with some success 8i got a decent frame rate by tweaking the config file under appdata/local) but i need to be able to use "dshow://" and possibly to tweak the cache paramter
can someone help me?
Many thanks inadvance.
